metadata.name: Clue 2 #1
metadata.description: Light the Night NFT is a collection of 2993 randomly generated NFT that exist on the Ethereum Blockchain. The first ever community-participatant puzzle(game) NFT collection which is based on the trending Taiwanese Netflix original series. NFT holders not only own a PFP, the NFTs are also a Metaverse VIP Access that invite holders to participate in more Chinese TV show productions and engage in a long-term drama metaverse community.Visit: [www.lightthenight.io](https://www.lightthenight.io/)
